channel.title: Yell command
channel.description: can someone give me a yell command that works on deltascape source.

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy

yeah saw after i posted >.> thanks much =)

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @xxxxsparkyxxxx xxxxsparkyxxxx
item.description:
@xxxxsparkyxxxx wrote:

[quote=“syzygy, post:10, topic:247318”]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

WORKS thats what i had to do is change the command.substring to 5 not 8 =p

lol and obviously u noticed too lol… so cool =p[/quote]

READ MY LAST POST ON THIS LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy
item.description:
@syzygy wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

WORKS thats what i had to do is change the command.substring to 5 not 8 =p

lol and obviously u noticed too lol… so cool =p

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @xxxxsparkyxxxx xxxxsparkyxxxx
item.description:
@xxxxsparkyxxxx wrote:

hmm 1 sec then

Code:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

that shud fix the 4 space gap…

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @xxxxsparkyxxxx xxxxsparkyxxxx
item.description:
@xxxxsparkyxxxx wrote:

hmm 1 sec then

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

that shud fix the 4 space gap…try it to see if it fixes player name

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy
item.description:
@syzygy wrote:

Nope, still shows just +playername+ as the username and also it takes "::yell " to get the command to work… thats 4 spaces there lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @xxxxsparkyxxxx xxxxsparkyxxxx
item.description:
@xxxxsparkyxxxx wrote:

hmm 1 sec

try

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[+playerName+]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
